OOC:  Sorry, this is and OOC message, if you don't want to Read it 
then skip it...


OOC:  I guess you want to be called Roland now, so i will call you 
Roland.  First off why do you think I used the word founder and not 
the word Council Member.  Because a founder had power before all the 
founders quit and then the council took over because they wanted the 
RPG to continue.

   If you Read the about section at nbwrpg.com, then you will hear a 
mention about the founders.  The guys from Louisiana  (Hey Yan, you 
might want to fix Luisiana to Lousiana.)  were the founders.  The 
founders were the ones that came up with the whole idea of Neo Beast 
Wars RPG.  Does the name Biostinger familiar to you.  Well I am not 
him, but I go to the same school as him and I made NBWRPG with him.

   I was the one that called him one day and said hey (I don't think 
he wants his name reveled) Biostinger, you know how you wanted to 
make an Beast Wars Rpg earlier, well I have an Idea for the Story 
line.  So I told him the story line.  He liked it and we figure that 
our good friend should be a co-founder.  We than had Biostinger 
go into the Beastwars RPG AOL Chatroom(He was the only one with AOL)  
I ended up making sites saying join NBWRPG.  And well Firestorm 316 
gr81(The Co-founder) just sat around and watched.

   So, I am instrumental in the making of this RPG.

   And also, Whem I say founder, I mean when I made this RPG, and if 
I say council, then I am mentioning the Council.

NOTE:  The main reason Firestorm 316 Gr81 just sat around and watch 
is because hid Dad was very very very very very very very Strict.

NOTE:  If anyone wants to take this up with me than email me at 
proto@...(Temp address While Hotmail fix things up.)


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Roland the Gunslinger" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: He is, and so are Jeff, Alloran, and Megan, although Megan's 
never on anymore. Unless the Council Election is over, Hedge isn't a 
founder yet. My pal Jer is also getting on the Council, it seems, and 
my good friend Alloran is sadly leaving the Council, as it seems 
right now. My friend Jeff is staying on, it seems, and my pal Lurker 
didn't go on at all. Alot of mixed emotions about this whole Coucil 
Election for me!...
> 
>
